content: Is it somehow possible to set the "publisher" property of the generated resources (profiles ect.) (other than editing the generated files by hand...)? I tried adding a "Publisher:" to my .fsh definitions, but that doesn't work. Couldn't find anything in the documentation either.

The "publisher" property can be set using the caret (^) syntax. So for example:

Profile: MyPatient
Parent: Patient
* ^publisher = "my publisher name"

In general, the ^ syntax is used to set things like "publisher", that are metadata attributes that are directly on the Structure Definition itself.
